description.@en: I carry a terrible gift . . . one that could get me strung from a bridge if discovered.

data.notes:
Mage Trait

Professions of this Archetype make use of strange healing arts, plumb the depths of the supernatural and study Spells. They come from all walks of life and have sacrificed some part of their humanity to further their aims.

effect.@en: Whenever you fail or Critically Fail an Incantation Test, you may turn it into a Critical Success. You move one step down the Peril Condition Track negatively as a result.
